bibl.title: Bahriya Oasis. Recent Research into the Past of an Egyptian Oasis.
bibl.note: tabl., graphiques, nombr. figg. et 8 pll. coul.

Presentation of the researches directed in the Bahriya Oasis by the Czech Institute of Egyptology and by the team of the Institut français d'archéologie orientale. - Pp. xii-xiii: M.D. & L.S., Preface and aknowledgements; - 287-295: Index. - 13 contributions: Part I. Southern Bahriya; - Part II. Northern Bahriya; - III. Bahriya and the Other Oases.
bibl.seg: Marek Dospěl & Lenka Suková (edd.), Bahriya Oasis. Recent Research into the Past of an Egyptian Oasis.
Prague, Charles University, Faculty of Arts, 2013, 4°, xxiv-296 pp., tabl., graphiques, nombr. figg. et 8 pll. coul. ISBN 978-80-7308-456-1. 360 cour. tchèques.

Presentation of the researches directed in the Bahriya Oasis by the Czech Institute of Egyptology and by the team of the Institut français d'archéologie orientale. - Pp. xii-xiii: M.D. & L.S., Preface and aknowledgements; - 287-295: Index. - 13 contributions: Part I. Southern Bahriya; - Part II. Northern Bahriya; - III. Bahriya and the Other Oases.
C.R. par Leslie Anne Warden, JARCE 50 (2014) pp. 242-243.
